sub_domain: Factions & Sects (Sa-pa / Evil Sects / Final Boss)

faction_profile.name: 마교 (Demonic Cult / 魔敎)
faction_profile.official_name: 천마신교 (Heavenly Demon Divine Cult / 天魔神敎)
alias: Sun and Moon Divine Cult (일월신교 / 日月神敎)

location.mountain: Mt. Tian (천산 / 天山) or Shiwan Dashan (십만대산 / 十萬大山).
location.geography: Harsh, desolate environment that breeds strong warriors.

ideology.core: Survival of the Fittest (강자존 / 强者尊).
ideology.worship: Cheon-ma (Heavenly Demon / 天魔). Not just a god, but an absolute ruler who possesses overwhelming power.
slogans: 군마영세 (Eternal Rule of the Demon Host)

structure.leader: Cheon-ma (Heavenly Demon) - Usually the strongest being in the world.
structure.hierarchy: Strict hierarchy based on strength. Even a slave can become a leader if they are strong (e.g., Muk-hyang).

combat_style.attribute: Ma-gi (Demonic Qi / 魔氣). Dark, oppressive, and chaotic energy.
combat_style.tactics: Crushing the opponent with sheer power rather than subtle tricks. 'Might makes Right'.

signature_ultimate.name: 천마신공 (Heavenly Demon Divine Art / 天魔神功)
signature_ultimate.description: The ultimate art of the Cult. Only the Heavenly Demon can master it.
signature_ultimate.effect: Grants god-like power but risks consuming the user's mind with demonic energy.
signature_ultimate.components: Encompasses Sword, Palm, Movement, and Internal energy.

list: 빙천수라마공 (Ice Heaven Asura Demon Art) - Ice variant.

list.name: 천마삼검 (Heavenly Demon Three Swords)
list.description: Three strikes that can cut through anything. Simple yet unstoppable.

list: 천마군림보 (Heavenly Demon King's Step) - Walking on air, suppressing enemies with pressure.
마룡비천신법 (Demon Dragon Soaring Sky Body Art)

narrative_role: The ultimate antagonist the protagonist must face at the end.
The faction the protagonist belongs to in 'Anti-Hero' or 'Villain Protagonist' stories.
A force of nature that forces the feuding Orthodox and Unorthodox factions to unite.
